Name: Smoke

Name: Man on the Moon

Name: Say Anything...

Name: Terms of Endearment

Name: Frances Ha

Name: Much Ado About Nothing

Name: Manhattan Murder Mystery

Name: Youth

Name: Tootsie

Name: Raising Arizona

Name: City Island

Name: Swingers

Name: The Italian Job
Credit: Dir: Peter Collinson With: Michael Caine, NoÃ«l Coward, Benny Hill

Name: Slap Shot
Credit: Dir: George Roy Hill With: Paul Newman, Michael Ontkean, Strother Martin

Name: Caddyshack

Name: The Descendants

Name: The Science of Sleep

Name: Clue

Name: The Hundred-Foot Journey

Name: The Terminal

Name: The Guard

Name: Force Majeure

Name: The Hudsucker Proxy

Name: Big Trouble in Little China

Name: Dumb & Dumber
Credit: Dir: Peter Farrelly With: Jim Carrey, Jeff Daniels, Lauren Holly
Outline: The cross-country adventures of two good-hearted but incredibly stupid friends.

Name: The Cat Returns

Name: Shaolin Soccer

Name: Sleeper

Name: Kung Fu Panda 2

Name: The Book of Life

Credit: Dir: Jorge R. GutiÃ©rrez With: Diego Luna, Zoe Saldana, Channing Tatum

Name: The Gods Must Be Crazy

Name: Big

Name: Jerry Maguire
Credit: Dir: Cameron Crowe With: Tom Cruise, Cuba Gooding Jr., RenÃ©e Zellweger
Outline: When a sports agent has a moral epiphany and is fired for expressing it, he decides to put his new philosophy to the test as an independent with the only athlete who stays with him.

Name: Soul Kitchen

Name: Chef

Name: Dope

Name: St. Vincent

Name: Men in Black

Name: Wild at Heart

Name: Re-Animator

Name: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy

Name: If Only

Name: The Sessions

Name: Hercules

Name: Benny & Joon

Credit: Dir: Greg Marcks With: Henry Thomas, Colin Hanks, Ben Foster

Name: True Lies

Name: 21 Jump Street

Name: Beginners

Name: Bananas

Name: Trollhunter
Credit: Dir: AndrÃ© Ãvredal With: Otto Jespersen, Robert Stoltenberg, Knut NÃ¦rum

Name: So I Married an Axe Murderer

Name: Bowfinger

Little does she realize she's not the only one with romantic troubles, as she, as he, gets in the middle of a series of intermingled love affairs.

Name: Feast

Name: Fright Night

Andie Anderson covers the "How To" beat for "Composure" magazine and is assigned to write an article on "How to Lose a Guy in 10 days." They meet in a bar shortly after the bet is made.

Name: Tango & Cash

Name: Down with Love

Name: Nurse Betty

Name: How High

But when Mr. Magorium, the 243 year-old eccentric who owns the store, bequeaths the store to her, a dark and ominous change begins to take over the once remarkable Emporium.

Name: Splash
Credit: Dir: Ron Howard With: Tom Hanks, Daryl Hannah, Eugene Levy

Name: Black Sheep

Name: The Princess Diaries

Outline: Mia Thermopolis has just found out that she is the heir apparent to the throne of Genovia. With her friends Lilly and Michael Moscovitz in tow, she tries to navigate through the rest of her 16th year.

Name: Throw Momma from the Train

Name: The Rum Diary

Name: Rush Hour 3

Name: Heartbreakers
Credit: Dir: David Mirkin With: Sigourney Weaver, Jennifer Love Hewitt, Gene Hackman
Outline: A mother and daughter con team seduce and scam wealthy men.

Name: The Rocker
Credit: Dir: Peter Cattaneo With: Rainn Wilson, Josh Gad, Christina Applegate

Name: Rock Star

Name: Big Stan

Name: Austin Powers in Goldmember

Name: Alexander and the Terrible, Horrible, No Good, Very Bad Day

However, he finds little sympathy from his family and begins to wonder if bad things only happen to him, his mom, dad, brother and sister - who all find themselves living through their own terrible, horrible, no good, very bad day.

Name: Bill & Ted's Bogus Journey
Credit: Dir: Peter Hewitt With: Keanu Reeves, Alex Winter, William Sadler
Outline: A tyrant from the future creates evil android doubles of Bill and Ted and sends them back to eliminate the originals.

Name: Hackers
Credit: Dir: Iain Softley With: Jonny Lee Miller, Angelina Jolie, Jesse Bradford
Outline: A young boy is arrested by the U.S. Secret Service for writing a computer virus and is banned from using a computer until his 18th birthday...

Name: Kung Pow: Enter the Fist
Credit: Dir: Steve Oedekerk With: Steve Oedekerk, Fei Lung, Leo Lee
Outline: A rough-around-the-edges martial arts master seeks revenge for his parent's death.

Name: Tower Heist
Credit: Dir: Brett Ratner With: Eddie Murphy, Ben Stiller, Casey Affleck
Outline: When a group of hard-working guys find out they've fallen victim to their wealthy employer's Ponzi scheme, they conspire to rob his high-rise residence.

Name: Orgazmo
Credit: Dir: Trey Parker With: Trey Parker, Dian Bachar, Robyn Lynne Raab
Outline: Naive young Mormon Joe Young is recruited to act in porn movies.

Name: Legally Blonde
Credit: Dir: Robert Luketic With: Reese Witherspoon, Luke Wilson, Selma Blair
Outline: When a blonde sorority queen is dumped by her boyfriend, she decides to follow him to law school to get him back and, once there, learns she has more legal savvy than she ever imagined.

Name: This Is 40
Credit: Dir: Judd Apatow With: Paul Rudd, Leslie Mann, Maude Apatow
Outline: Pete and Debbie are both about to turn 40, their kids hate each other, both of their businesses are failing, they're on the verge of losing their house, and their relationship is threatening to fall apart.

Name: The Game Plan

Outline: An NFL quarterback living the bachelor lifestyle discovers that he has an 8-year-old daughter from a previous relationship.

Name: The Five-Year Engagement

Outline: One year after meeting, Tom proposes to his girlfriend, Violet, but unexpected events keep tripping them up as they look to walk down the aisle together.

Name: Daddy's Home

Outline: Stepdad, Brad Whitaker, is a radio host trying to get his stepchildren to love him and call him Dad. But his plans turn upside down when the biological father, Dusty Mayron, returns.

Name: Jersey Girl
Credit: Dir: Kevin Smith With: Ben Affleck, Liv Tyler, Raquel Castro
Outline: After his career is sidelined by an unexpected tragedy and a personal blowup, a single man must take care of his precocious daughter.

Name: Extract

Name: The Ladykillers

Name: Idle Hands

Name: The First Wives Club

Name: Alfie

Name: Open Season

Name: Scary Movie
Credit: Dir: Keenen Ivory Wayans With: Anna Faris, Jon Abrahams, Marlon Wayans

Name: The Big Year

Name: Vacation

Name: Bee Movie

Outline: Barry B. Benson, a bee just graduated from college, is disillusioned at his lone career choice: making honey. As their relationship blossoms, he discovers humans actually eat honey, and subsequently decides to sue them.

Name: Fired Up!
Credit: Dir: Will Gluck With: Eric Christian Olsen, Nicholas D'Agosto, Sarah Roemer

Name: Man of the Year

Outline: A comedian who hosts a news satire program decides to run for president, and a computerized voting machine malfunction gets him elected.

Name: Friends with Kids
Credit: Dir: Jennifer Westfeldt With: Jennifer Westfeldt, Adam Scott, Maya Rudolph
Outline: Two best friends decide to have a child together while keeping their relationship platonic, so they can avoid the toll kids can take on romantic relationships.

Name: The Nanny Diaries

Name: The Campaign

Name: Ride Along

Name: Porky's

Outline: An FBI agent must go undercover in the Miss United States beauty pageant to prevent a group from bombing the event.

Name: 30 Minutes or Less

Name: Drinking Buddies

Outline: Luke and Kate are coworkers at a brewery who spend their nights drinking and flirting heavily. One weekend away together with their significant others proves who really belongs together and who doesn't.

Name: One Night at McCool's

Outline: Every man has a different recollection of the beautiful young woman who wreaked havoc on their lives during one heated night.

Name: Romy and Michele's High School Reunion

Outline: Two dense, inseparable friends hit the road for their 10-year high school reunion and concoct an elaborate lie about their lives in order to impress their classmates.

Name: Zathura: A Space Adventure
Genre: Action | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy | Sci-Fi
Credit: Dir: Jon Favreau With: Josh Hutcherson, Jonah Bobo, Dax Shepard
Outline: Two young brothers are drawn into an intergalactic adventure when their house is hurled through the depths of space by the magical board game they are playing.

Name: Freaky Friday

Name: Fun with Dick and Jane

Outline: When an affluent couple lose all their money following a series of blunders, they turn to a life of crime to make ends meet.

Name: Practical Magic

Name: Wayne's World 2
Credit: Dir: Stephen Surjik With: Mike Myers, Dana Carvey, Christopher Walken
Outline: The inseparable duo try to organize a rock concert while Wayne must fend off a record producer who has an eye for his girlfriend.

Name: A Million Ways to Die in the West

Name: Planet 51

Name: National Lampoon's European Vacation

Outline: The Griswolds win a vacation tour across Europe where the usual havoc ensues.

Name: Johnny English

Name: 27 Dresses

Outline: After serving as a bridesmaid 27 times, a young woman wrestles with the idea of standing by her sister's side as her sibling marries the man she's secretly in love with.

Name: 13 Going on 30
Credit: Dir: Gary Winick With: Jennifer Garner, Mark Ruffalo, Judy Greer
Outline: A 13 year old girl plays a game on her 13th birthday and wakes up the next day as a 30 year old woman.

Name: Sisters
Credit: Dir: Jason Moore With: Amy Poehler, Tina Fey, Maya Rudolph
Outline: Two sisters decide to throw one last house party before their parents sell their family home.

Name: S1m0ne

Outline: A producer's film is endangered when his star walks off, so he decides to digitally create an actress to substitute for the star, becoming an overnight sensation that everyone thinks is a real person.

Name: The Cannonball Run

Outline: A wide variety of eccentric competitors participate in a wild and illegal cross-country road race. However, the eccentric entrants will do anything to win the road race, including low-down, dirty tricks.

Name: Hit and Run

Outline: Former getaway driver Charlie Bronson jeopardizes his Witness Protection Plan identity in order to help his girlfriend get to Los Angeles. The feds and Charlie's former gang chase them on the road.

Name: Starsky & Hutch
Credit: Dir: Todd Phillips With: Ben Stiller, Owen Wilson, Snoop Dogg
Outline: Two streetwise cops bust criminals in their red-and-white Ford Torino with the help of police snitch called Huggy Bear.

Name: Small Soldiers
Credit: Dir: Joe Dante With: Kirsten Dunst, Gregory Smith, David Cross
Outline: When missile technology is used to enhance toy action figures, the toys soon begin to take their battle programming too seriously.

Name: Chasing Liberty
Credit: Dir: Andy Cadiff With: Mandy Moore, Matthew Goode, Mark Harmon
Outline: Anna Foster has never had an ordinary life. At eighteen years old, she is the most protected girl in America; she is the First Daughter...

Name: Hobo with a Shotgun
Credit: Dir: Jason Eisener With: Rutger Hauer, Pasha Ebrahimi, Robb Wells
Outline: A homeless vigilante blows away crooked cops, pedophile Santas, and other scumbags with his trusty pump-action shotgun.

Name: Doc Hollywood
Credit: Dir: Michael Caton-Jones With: Michael J. Fox, Julie Warner, Barnard Hughes
Outline: A young doctor causes a traffic accident in a small town and is sentenced to work for some days at the town hospital.

Name: Loaded Weapon 1
Credit: Dir: Gene Quintano With: Emilio Estevez, Samuel L. Jackson, Jon Lovitz
Outline: An LA detective is murdered because she has microfilm with the recipe to make cocaine cookies. A "Lethal...

Name: The Wedding Date
Credit: Dir: Clare Kilner With: Dermot Mulroney, Debra Messing, Jack Davenport
Outline: Single-girl anxiety causes Kat Ellis (Messing) to hire a male escort (Mulroney) to pose as her boyfriend at her sister's wedding. Her plan, an attempt to dupe her ex-fiancÃ©, who dumped her a couple years prior, proves to be her undoing.

Name: Bedtime Stories
Credit: Dir: Adam Shankman With: Adam Sandler, Keri Russell, Courteney Cox
Outline: A hotel handyman's life changes when the lavish bedtime stories he tells his niece and nephew start to magically come true.

Name: Airplane II: The Sequel
Credit: Dir: Ken Finkleman With: Robert Hays, Julie Hagerty, Lloyd Bridges
Outline: A faulty computer causes a passenger space shuttle to head straight for the Sun. Can Ted Striker save the day and get the shuttle back on track--again???

Name: Men in Black II
Credit: Dir: Barry Sonnenfeld With: Tommy Lee Jones, Will Smith, Rip Torn
Outline: Agent J needs help so he is sent to find Agent K and restore his memory.

Name: Wild Child
Credit: Dir: Nick Moore With: Emma Roberts, Aidan Quinn, Natasha Richardson
Outline: A rebellious Malibu princess is shipped off to a strict English boarding school by her father.

Name: The Mexican
Credit: Dir: Gore Verbinski With: Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, James Gandolfini
Outline: A man tries to transport an ancient gun called The Mexican, believed to carry a curse, back across the border, while his girlfriend pressures him to give up his criminal ways.

Name: Uptown Girls

Outline: A grown-up woman, who kept her childish instincts and behavior, starts working as a nanny of a 8-year-old girl, who actually acts like an adult. But in the end everything turns to its right places.

Name: Magic Mike
Credit: Dir: Steven Soderbergh With: Channing Tatum, Alex Pettyfer, Olivia Munn
Outline: A male stripper teaches a younger performer how to party, pick up women, and make easy money.

Name: What Happens in Vegas

Name: American Ultra

Name: Shall We Dance
Credit: Dir: Peter Chelsom With: Richard Gere, Jennifer Lopez, Susan Sarandon
Outline: A romantic comedy where a bored, overworked Estate Lawyer, upon first sight of a beautiful instructor, signs up for ballroom dancing lessons.

Name: The Switch
Credit: Dir: Josh Gordon, Will Speck With: Jennifer Aniston, Jason Bateman, Patrick Wilson
Outline: Seven years after the fact, a man comes to the realization that he was the sperm donor for his best friend's boy.

Name: Edtv
Credit: Dir: Ron Howard With: Matthew McConaughey, Jenna Elfman, Woody Harrelson
Outline: A video store clerk agrees to have his life filmed by a camera crew for a television show.

Name: The Waterboy
Credit: Dir: Frank Coraci With: Adam Sandler, Kathy Bates, Henry Winkler
Outline: A waterboy for a college football team discovers he has a unique tackling ability and becomes a member of the team.

Name: Dick Tracy
Credit: Dir: Warren Beatty With: Warren Beatty, Madonna, Al Pacino
Outline: The comic strip detective finds his life vastly complicated when Breathless Mahoney makes advances towards him while he is trying to battle Big Boy Caprice's united mob.

Name: The Kid
Credit: Dir: Jon Turteltaub With: Bruce Willis, Spencer Breslin, Emily Mortimer
Outline: An unhappy and disliked image consultant gets a second shot at life when an eight year old version of himself mysteriously appears.

Name: Get Hard
Credit: Dir: Etan Cohen With: Will Ferrell, Kevin Hart, Alison Brie
Outline: When millionaire James King is jailed for fraud and bound for San Quentin, he turns to Darnell Lewis to prep him to go behind bars.

Name: The Jewel of the Nile
Credit: Dir: Lewis Teague With: Michael Douglas, Kathleen Turner, Danny DeVito
Outline: This is the sequel to "Romancing the Stone" where Jack and Joan have their yacht and easy life, but...

Name: Next Friday

Name: Two Weeks Notice

Outline: A lawyer decides that she's used too much like a nanny by her boss, so she walks out on him.

Name: Shrek the Third

Not one to give up his beloved swamp, Shrek recruits his friends Donkey and Puss in Boots to install the rebellious Artie as the new king. Princess Fiona, however, rallies a band of royal girlfriends to fend off a coup d'etat by the jilted Prince Charming.

Name: Larry Crowne
Credit: Dir: Tom Hanks With: Tom Hanks, Julia Roberts, Sarah Mahoney
Outline: After losing his job, a middle-aged man reinvents himself by going back to college.

Name: Baby Mama
Credit: Dir: Michael McCullers With: Tina Fey, Amy Poehler, Sigourney Weaver
Outline: A successful, single businesswoman who dreams of having a baby discovers she is infertile and hires a working class woman to be her unlikely surrogate.

Name: Evolution

Name: Mystery Men
Credit: Dir: Kinka Usher With: Ben Stiller, Janeane Garofalo, William H. Macy
Outline: A group of inept amateur superheroes must try to save the day when a supervillian threatens to destroy a major superhero and the city.

Name: What's Your Number?

Name: The Cable Guy

Name: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water

Name: Leatherheads

Name: Airheads

Name: I Now Pronounce You Chuck & Larry

Name: Fools Rush In

Name: Kindergarten Cop

Outline: A tough cop is given his most difficult assignment ever: to masquerade as a kindergarten teacher in order to find a drug dealer.

Name: Red Heat

Name: Mr. Popper's Penguins

Name: Turner & Hooch

Outline: A detective must adopt the dog of a dead man to help him find the murderer.

Name: Nim's Island

Name: Never Been Kissed

Outline: A journalist enrolls in her old highschool as part of her research for a story.

Name: Casper

Name: How the Grinch Stole Christmas

Name: Sahara

Name: Raising Helen

Name: Machete Kills
Credit: Dir: Robert Rodriguez With: Danny Trejo, Alexa PenaVega, Mel Gibson
Outline: The U.S. government recruits Machete to battle his way through Mexico in order to take down an arms dealer who looks to launch a weapon into space.

Name: 101 Dalmatians
Credit: Dir: Stephen Herek With: Glenn Close, Jeff Daniels, Joely Richardson
Outline: A woman kidnaps puppies to kill them for their fur, but various animals then gang up against her and get their revenge in slapstick fashion.

Name: Wanderlust
Credit: Dir: David Wain With: Jennifer Aniston, Paul Rudd, Malin Akerman
Outline: Rattled by sudden unemployment, a Manhattan couple surveys alternative living options, ultimately deciding to experiment with living on a rural commune where free love rules.

Name: Lake Placid
Credit: Dir: Steve Miner With: Bridget Fonda, Bill Pullman, Oliver Platt
Outline: Three people attempt to stop a gigantic crocodile, who is terrorizing residents in Black Lake, Maine.

Name: The Big Wedding
Credit: Dir: Justin Zackham With: Robert De Niro, Diane Keaton, Katherine Heigl
Outline: A long-divorced couple fakes being married as their family unites for a wedding.

Name: Cabin Fever
Credit: Dir: Eli Roth With: Jordan Ladd, Rider Strong, James DeBello
Outline: A group of five college graduates rent a cabin in the woods and begin to fall victim to a horrifying flesh-eating virus, which attracts the unwanted attention of the homicidal locals.

Name: Police Academy 2: Their First Assignment
Credit: Dir: Jerry Paris With: Steve Guttenberg, Bubba Smith, David Graf
Outline: When a new gang moves into town it's up to the screwball police team to stop them.

Name: 40 Days and 40 Nights
Credit: Dir: Michael Lehmann With: Josh Hartnett, Shannyn Sossamon, Paulo Costanzo
Outline: After a brutal break-up, a young man vows to stay celibate during the forty days of Lent, but finds the girl of his dreams and is unable to do anything about it.

Name: You, Me and Dupree
Credit: Dir: Anthony Russo, Joe Russo With: Kate Hudson, Owen Wilson, Matt Dillon
Outline: A best man (Wilson) stays on as a houseguest with the newlyweds, much to the couple's annoyance.

Name: Bad Company
Credit: Dir: Joel Schumacher With: Anthony Hopkins, Chris Rock, Peter Stormare
Outline: When a Harvard-educated CIA agent is killed during an operation, the secret agency recruits his twin brother.

Name: Coyote Ugly
Credit: Dir: David McNally With: Piper Perabo, Adam Garcia, John Goodman
Outline: Aspiring songwriter Violet Sanford, after getting a job at a women-run NYC bar that teases its male patrons, comes out of her shell.

Name: Because I Said So
Credit: Dir: Michael Lehmann With: Diane Keaton, Mandy Moore, Gabriel Macht
Outline: A meddling mother tries to set her daughter up with the right man so her kid won't follow in her footsteps.

Name: Fred Claus
Credit: Dir: David Dobkin With: Vince Vaughn, Paul Giamatti, Elizabeth Banks
Outline: Fred Claus, Santa's bitter older brother, is forced to move to the North Pole.

Name: Failure to Launch
Credit: Dir: Tom Dey With: Matthew McConaughey, Sarah Jessica Parker, Kathy Bates
Outline: A thirtysomething slacker suspects his parents of setting him up with his dream girl so he'll finally vacate their home.

Name: That's My Boy
Credit: Dir: Sean Anders With: Adam Sandler, Andy Samberg, Leighton Meester
Outline: While in his teens, Donny fathered a son, Todd, and raised him as a single parent up until Todd's 18th birthday. Now, after not seeing each other for years, Todd's world comes crashing down when Donny resurfaces just before Todd's wedding.

Name: The Pink Panther
Credit: Dir: Shawn Levy With: Steve Martin, Kevin Kline, Jean Reno
Outline: Bumbling Inspector Clouseau must solve the murder of a famous soccer coach and find out who stole the infamous Pink Panther diamond.

Name: Good Luck Chuck
Credit: Dir: Mark Helfrich With: Dane Cook, Jessica Alba, Dan Fogler
Outline: In order to keep the woman of his dreams from falling for another guy, Charlie Logan has to break the curse that has made him wildly popular with single women: Sleep with Charlie once, and the next man you meet will be your true love.

Name: R.I.P.D.
Credit: Dir: Robert Schwentke With: Ryan Reynolds, Jeff Bridges, Mary-Louise Parker
Outline: A recently slain cop joins a team of undead police officers working for the Rest in Peace Department and tries to find the man who murdered him.

Name: Mirror Mirror
Credit: Dir: Tarsem Singh With: Lily Collins, Julia Roberts, Armie Hammer
Outline: An evil queen steals control of a kingdom and an exiled princess enlists the help of seven resourceful rebels to win back her birthright.

Name: The Benchwarmers
Credit: Dir: Dennis Dugan With: David Spade, Jon Heder, Rob Schneider
Outline: A trio of guys try and make up for missed opportunities in childhood by forming a three-player baseball team to compete against standard children baseball squads.

Name: Vampire Academy
Credit: Dir: Mark Waters With: Zoey Deutch, Lucy Fry, Danila Kozlovsky
Outline: Rose Hathaway is a Dhampir, half human-half vampire, a guardian of the Moroi, peaceful, mortal vampires living discreetly within our world. Her calling is to protect the Moroi from bloodthirsty, immortal Vampires, the Strigoi.

Name: Money Train
Credit: Dir: Joseph Ruben With: Wesley Snipes, Woody Harrelson, Jennifer Lopez
Outline: A vengeful New York transit cop decides to steal a trainload of subway fares; his foster brother, a fellow cop, tries to protect him.

Name: National Security
Credit: Dir: Dennis Dugan With: Martin Lawrence, Steve Zahn, Colm Feore
Outline: Two mismatched security guards are thrown together to bust a smuggling operation.

Name: Your Highness
Credit: Dir: David Gordon Green With: Danny McBride, Natalie Portman, James Franco
Outline: When Prince Fabious's bride is kidnapped, he goes on a quest to rescue her... accompanied by his lazy useless brother Thadeous.

Name: The Nutty Professor
Credit: Dir: Tom Shadyac With: Eddie Murphy, Jada Pinkett Smith, James Coburn
Outline: Grossly overweight professor Sherman Klump, desperate to lose weight, takes a special chemical that turns him into the slim but obnoxious Buddy Love.

Name: Kicking & Screaming
Credit: Dir: Jesse Dylan With: Will Ferrell, Robert Duvall, Josh Hutcherson
Outline: Family man Phil Weston, a lifelong victim of his father's competitive nature, takes on the coaching duties of a kids' soccer team, and soon finds that he's also taking on his father's dysfunctional way of relating...

Name: Bringing Down the House
Credit: Dir: Adam Shankman With: Steve Martin, Queen Latifah, Eugene Levy
Outline: When a lonely guy meets a woman on the internet who happens to be in prison, she breaks out to be with him, and proceeds to wreak havoc on his middle-class life.

Name: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
Credit: Dir: Fran Rubel Kuzui With: Kristy Swanson, Donald Sutherland, Paul Reubens
Outline: A flighty teenage girl learns that she is her generation's destined battler of vampires.

Name: The Santa Clause 2
Credit: Dir: Michael Lembeck With: Tim Allen, Spencer Breslin, Elizabeth Mitchell
Outline: Scott Calvin has been a humble Santa Claus for nearly ten years, but it might come to an end if he doesn't find a Mrs. Claus.

Name: The Pink Panther 2
Credit: Dir: Harald Zwart With: Steve Martin, Jean Reno, Emily Mortimer
Outline: Insp. Jacques Clouseau teams up with a squad of International detectives who are just as bumbling as he is. Their mission: Stop a globe-trotting thief who specializes in stealing historical artifacts.

Name: Beethoven
Credit: Dir: Brian Levant With: Charles Grodin, Bonnie Hunt, Dean Jones
Outline: A slobbering St. Bernard becomes the center of attention for a loving family, but its veterinarian secretly wants to kill him.

Name: The Pacifier
Credit: Dir: Adam Shankman With: Vin Diesel, Brittany Snow, Max Thieriot
Outline: Disgraced Navy SEAL Shane Wolfe is handed a new assignment: Protect the five Plummer kids from enemies of their recently deceased father -- a government scientist whose top-secret experiment remains in the kids' house.

Name: Mortdecai
Credit: Dir: David Koepp With: Johnny Depp, Gwyneth Paltrow, Ewan McGregor
Outline: Juggling angry Russians, the British Mi5, and an international terrorist, debonair art dealer and part time rogue Charlie Mortdecai races to recover a stolen painting rumored to contain a code that leads to lost Nazi gold.

Name: Daddy Day Care
Credit: Dir: Steve Carr With: Eddie Murphy, Jeff Garlin, Anjelica Huston
Outline: Two men get laid off and have to become stay-at-home dads when they can't find jobs. This inspires them to open their own day-care center.

Name: You Don't Mess with the Zohan
Credit: Dir: Dennis Dugan With: Adam Sandler, John Turturro, Emmanuelle Chriqui
Outline: An Israeli Special Forces Soldier fakes his death so he can re-emerge in New York City as a hair stylist.

Name: When in Rome
Credit: Dir: Mark Steven Johnson With: Kristen Bell, Josh Duhamel, Anjelica Huston
Outline: Beth is a young, ambitious New Yorker who is completely unlucky in love. However, on a whirlwind trip to Rome, she impulsively steals some coins from a reputed fountain of love, and is then aggressively pursued by a band of suitors.

Name: The Bounty Hunter
Credit: Dir: Andy Tennant With: Jennifer Aniston, Gerard Butler, Gio Perez
Outline: A bounty hunter learns that his next target is his ex-wife, a reporter working on a murder cover-up. Soon after their reunion, the always-at-odds duo find themselves on a run-for-their-lives adventure.

Name: Exit Wounds
Credit: Dir: Andrzej Bartkowiak With: Steven Seagal, DMX, Isaiah Washington
Outline: Orin Boyd, a tough cop in an inner-city precinct discovers a web of dirty cops and corruption.

Name: Charlie's Angels
Credit: Dir: McG With: Cameron Diaz, Drew Barrymore, Lucy Liu
Outline: Three women, detectives with a mysterious boss, retrieve stolen voice-ID software, using martial arts, tech skills, and sex appeal.

Name: Couples Retreat
Credit: Dir: Peter Billingsley With: Vince Vaughn, Malin Akerman, Jon Favreau
Outline: A comedy centered around four couples who settle into a tropical-island resort for a vacation. While one of the couples is there to work on the marriage, the others fail to realize that participation in the resort's therapy sessions is not optional.

Name: Showtime
Credit: Dir: Tom Dey With: Robert De Niro, Eddie Murphy, Rene Russo
Outline: A spoof of buddy cop movies where two very different cops are forced to team up on a new reality based T.V. cop show.

Name: Southland Tales
Credit: Dir: Richard Kelly With: Dwayne Johnson, Sarah Michelle Gellar, Seann William Scott
Outline: During a three day heat wave just before a huge 4th of July celebration, an action star stricken with amnesia meets up with a porn star who is developing her own reality TV project, and a policeman who holds the key to a vast conspiracy.

Name: The Smurfs
Credit: Dir: Raja Gosnell With: Hank Azaria, Katy Perry, Jonathan Winters
Outline: When the evil wizard Gargamel chases the tiny blue Smurfs out of their village, they tumble from their magical world into New York City.

Name: RV
Credit: Dir: Barry Sonnenfeld With: Robin Williams, Cheryl Hines, Kristin Chenoweth
Outline: Bob Munro and his dysfunctional family rent an RV for a road trip to the Colorado Rockies, where they ultimately have to contend with a bizarre community of campers.

Name: Piranha 3D
Credit: Dir: Alexandre Aja With: Elisabeth Shue, Jerry O'Connell, Richard Dreyfuss
Outline: After a sudden underwater tremor sets free scores of the prehistoric man-eating fish, an unlikely group of strangers must band together to stop themselves from becoming fish food for the area's new razor-toothed residents.

Name: Sex and the City
Credit: Dir: Michael Patrick King With: Sarah Jessica Parker, Kim Cattrall, Cynthia Nixon
Outline: A New York writer on sex and love is finally getting married to her Mr. Big. But her three best girlfriends must console her after one of them inadvertently leads Mr. Big to jilt her.

Name: Beverly Hills Cop III
Credit: Dir: John Landis With: Eddie Murphy, Jon Tenney, Joey Travolta
Outline: Axel Foley, while investigating a car theft ring, comes across something much bigger than that: the same men who shot his boss are running a counterfeit money ring out of a theme park in Los Angeles.

Name: The House Bunny
Credit: Dir: Fred Wolf With: Anna Faris, Colin Hanks, Emma Stone
Outline: After Playboy bunny Shelley is kicked out of the playboy mansion, she finds a job as the house mother for a sorority full of socially awkward girls.

Name: Dude, Where's My Car?
Credit: Dir: Danny Leiner With: Ashton Kutcher, Seann William Scott, Jennifer Garner
Outline: Two potheads wake up after a night of partying and cannot remember where they parked their car.

Name: The Hot Chick
Credit: Dir: Tom Brady With: Rob Schneider, Rachel McAdams, Anna Faris
Outline: An attractive and popular teenager who is mean spirited toward others, finds herself in the body of an older man, and must find a way to get back to her original body.

Name: Rumor Has It...
Credit: Dir: Rob Reiner With: Jennifer Aniston, Mark Ruffalo, Shirley MacLaine
Outline: Sarah Huttinger is a woman who learns that her family was the inspiration for the book and film "The Graduate" -- and that she just might be the offspring of the well-documented event.

Name: Crocodile Dundee II
Credit: Dir: John Cornell With: Paul Hogan, Linda Kozlowski, John Meillon
Outline: Australian outback expert protects his New York love from gangsters who've followed her down under.

Name: Employee of the Month
Credit: Dir: Greg Coolidge With: Jessica Simpson, Dane Cook, Dax Shepard
Outline: A slacker competes with a repeat winner for the "Employee of the Month" title at work, in order to gain the affections of a new female employee.

Name: Beverly Hills Ninja
Credit: Dir: Dennis Dugan With: Chris Farley, Nicollette Sheridan, Robin Shou
Outline: A man tries to rescue a woman with a little help from his half brother.

Name: Dennis the Menace
Credit: Dir: Nick Castle With: Walter Matthau, Mason Gamble, Joan Plowright
Outline: When his parents have to go out of town, Dennis stays with Mr. and Mrs. Wilson. The little menace is driving Mr. Wilson crazy, but Dennis is just trying to be helpful. Even to the thief who's arrived in town.

Name: The Whole Ten Yards
Credit: Dir: Howard Deutch With: Bruce Willis, Matthew Perry, Natasha Henstridge
Outline: Jimmy the Tulip's (Willis) quiet new life is shaken up by his old pal Oz (Perry), whose wife (Henstridge) has been kidnapped by a Hungarian mob. The Tulip and his wife Jill (Peet) spring into action.

Name: Little Fockers
Credit: Dir: Paul Weitz With: Ben Stiller, Teri Polo, Robert De Niro
Outline: Family-patriarch Jack Byrnes wants to appoint a successor. Does his son-in-law, the male nurse Greg Focker have what it takes?

Name: MacGruber
Credit: Dir: Jorma Taccone With: Will Forte, Kristen Wiig, Val Kilmer
Outline: Former special operative MacGruber is called back into action to take down his arch-enemy, Dieter Von Cunth, who's in possession of a nuclear warhead and bent on destroying Washington, D.C.

Name: Bulletproof Monk
Credit: Dir: Paul Hunter With: Yun-Fat Chow, Seann William Scott, Jaime King
Outline: Based on the very underground comic book, a Tibetan monk becomes a mentor to a young street kid whom he can teach to protect a scroll.

Name: Runaway Bride
Credit: Dir: Garry Marshall With: Julia Roberts, Richard Gere, Joan Cusack
Outline: A reporter is assigned to write a story about a woman who has left a string of fiances at the altar.

Name: Scary Movie 3
Credit: Dir: David Zucker With: Anna Faris, Charlie Sheen, Regina Hall
Outline: In the third installment of the Scary Movie franchise, Cindy has to investigate mysterious crop circles and video tapes, and help the President in preventing an alien invasion.

Name: Monster-in-Law
Credit: Dir: Robert Luketic With: Jennifer Lopez, Michael Vartan, Jane Fonda
Outline: The love life of Charlotte is reduced to an endless string of disastrous blind dates, until she meets the perfect man, Kevin. Unfortunately, his merciless mother will do anything to destroy their relationship.

Name: Aloha
Credit: Dir: Cameron Crowe With: Bradley Cooper, Rachel McAdams, Emma Stone
Outline: A celebrated military contractor returns to the site of his greatest career triumphs and reconnects with a long-ago love while unexpectedly falling for the hard-charging Air Force watch-dog assigned to him.

Name: Teeth
Credit: Dir: Mitchell Lichtenstein With: Jess Weixler, John Hensley, Josh Pais
Outline: Still a stranger to her own body, a high school student discovers she has a physical advantage when she becomes the object of male violence.

Name: Jingle All the Way
Credit: Dir: Brian Levant With: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Sinbad, Phil Hartman
Outline: A father vows to get his son a Turbo Man action figure for Christmas, however, every store is sold out of them, and he must travel all over town and compete with everybody else in order to find one.

Name: Just Married
Credit: Dir: Shawn Levy With: Ashton Kutcher, Brittany Murphy, Christian Kane
Outline: A young newlywed couple honeymoon in Europe, where obstacles challenge their ability to sustain the marriage.

Name: Stuart Little 2
Credit: Dir: Rob Minkoff With: Michael J. Fox, Geena Davis, Hugh Laurie
Outline: Stuart and Snowbell set out across town to rescue a friend.

Name: The Smurfs 2
Credit: Dir: Raja Gosnell With: Neil Patrick Harris, Jayma Mays, Katy Perry
Outline: The Smurfs team up with their human friends to rescue Smurfette, who has been kidnapped by Gargamel since she knows a secret spell that can turn the evil sorcerer's newest creation - creatures called the Naughties - into real Smurfs.

Name: George of the Jungle
Credit: Dir: Sam Weisman With: Brendan Fraser, Leslie Mann, Thomas Haden Church
Outline: George grows up in the jungle raised by apes. Based on the Cartoon series.

Name: Nine Months
Credit: Dir: Chris Columbus With: Hugh Grant, Julianne Moore, Tom Arnold
Outline: When he finds out his longtime girlfriend is pregnant, a commitment-phobe realizes he might have to change his lifestyle for better or much, much worse.

Name: Bride Wars
Credit: Dir: Gary Winick With: Kate Hudson, Anne Hathaway, Candice Bergen
Outline: Two best friends become rivals when they schedule their respective weddings on the same day.

Name: The Spy Next Door
Credit: Dir: Brian Levant With: Jackie Chan, Amber Valletta, Billy Ray Cyrus
Outline: Former CIA spy Bob Ho takes on his toughest assignment to date: looking after his girlfriend's three kids, who haven't exactly warmed to their mom's beau.

Name: Cheaper by the Dozen 2
Credit: Dir: Adam Shankman With: Steve Martin, Bonnie Hunt, Hilary Duff
Outline: Steve Martin and Bonnie Hunt return as heads of the Baker family who, while on vacation, find themselves in competition with a rival family of eight children, headed by Eugene Levy.

Name: Spy Kids
Credit: Dir: Robert Rodriguez With: Alexa PenaVega, Daryl Sabara, Antonio Banderas
Outline: The children of secret-agent parents must save them from danger.

Name: White Chicks
Credit: Dir: Keenen Ivory Wayans With: Marlon Wayans, Shawn Wayans, Busy Philipps
Outline: Two disgraced FBI agents go way undercover in an effort to protect hotel heiresses the Wilson Sisters from a kidnapping plot.

Name: I Spy
Credit: Dir: Betty Thomas With: Eddie Murphy, Owen Wilson, Famke Janssen
Outline: A professional athlete has to help a U.S. government agent recover a missing jet.

Name: Evan Almighty
Credit: Dir: Tom Shadyac With: Steve Carell, Morgan Freeman, Lauren Graham
Outline: God contacts Congressman Evan Baxter and tells him to build an ark in preparation for a great flood.

Name: Killers
Credit: Dir: Robert Luketic With: Katherine Heigl, Ashton Kutcher, Tom Selleck
Outline: A vacationing woman meets her ideal man, leading to a swift marriage. Back at home, however, their idyllic life is upset when they discover their neighbors could be assassins who have been contracted to kill the couple.

Name: Tusk
Credit: Dir: Kevin Smith With: Justin Long, Michael Parks, Haley Joel Osment
Outline: When podcaster Wallace Bryton goes missing in the backwoods of Manitoba while interviewing a mysterious seafarer named Howard Howe, his best friend Teddy and girlfriend Allison team with an ex-cop to look for him.

Name: Grown Ups 2
Credit: Dir: Dennis Dugan With: Adam Sandler, Kevin James, Chris Rock
Outline: After moving his family back to his hometown to be with his friends and their kids, Lenny finds out that between old bullies, new bullies, schizo bus drivers, drunk cops on skis, and 400 costumed party crashers sometimes crazy follows you.

Name: Big Fat Liar
Credit: Dir: Shawn Levy With: Frankie Muniz, Amanda Bynes, Paul Giamatti
Outline: After a young boy's school essay erroneously finds its way into the hands of a Hollywood producer who turns the idea into a hit film, the boy travels to Los Angeles to claim his credit.

Name: Eight Legged Freaks
Credit: Dir: Ellory Elkayem With: David Arquette, Kari Wuhrer, Scott Terra
Outline: A variety of horrible poisonous spiders get exposed to a noxious chemical that causes them to grow to monumental proportions.

Name: Forces of Nature
Credit: Dir: Bronwen Hughes With: Sandra Bullock, Ben Affleck, Maura Tierney
Outline: A soon-to-be-married man encounters an exciting stranger after his plane suffers an accident on takeoff.

Name: Old Dogs
Credit: Dir: Walt Becker With: Robin Williams, John Travolta, Seth Green
Outline: Two friends and business partners find their lives turned upside down when strange circumstances lead to them being placed in the care of 7-year-old twins.

Name: Sister Act 2: Back in the Habit
Credit: Dir: Bill Duke With: Whoopi Goldberg, Kathy Najimy, Maggie Smith
Outline: The sisters come back to Delores's show to get her back as Sister Mary Clarence to teach music to a...

Name: Land of the Lost
Credit: Dir: Brad Silberling With: Will Ferrell, Danny McBride, Anna Friel
Outline: On his latest expedition, Dr. Rick Marshall is sucked into a space-time vortex alongside his research assistant and a redneck survivalist. In this alternate universe, the trio make friends with a primate named Chaka, their only ally in a world full of dinosaurs and other fantastic creatures.

Name: How Do You Know
Credit: Dir: James L. Brooks With: Reese Witherspoon, Paul Rudd, Owen Wilson
Outline: After being cut from the USA softball team and feeling a bit past her prime, Lisa finds herself evaluating her life and in the middle of a love triangle, as a corporate guy in crisis competes with her current, baseball-playing beau.

Name: Bride of Chucky
Credit: Dir: Ronny Yu With: Jennifer Tilly, Brad Dourif, Katherine Heigl
Outline: Chucky, the doll possessed by a serial killer, discovers the perfect mate to kill and revive into the body of another doll.

Name: I Love You, Beth Cooper
Credit: Dir: Chris Columbus With: Hayden Panettiere, Paul Rust, Jack Carpenter
Outline: A nerdy valedictorian proclaims his love for the hottest and most popular girl in school - Beth Cooper - during his graduation speech. Much to his surprise, Beth shows up at his door that very night and decides to show him the best night of his life.

Name: Just My Luck
Credit: Dir: Donald Petrie With: Lindsay Lohan, Chris Pine, Samaire Armstrong
Outline: Manhattanite Ashley is known to many as the luckiest woman around. After a chance encounter with a down-and-out young man, however, she realizes that she's swapped her fortune for his.

Name: The Lizzie McGuire Movie
Credit: Dir: Jim Fall With: Hilary Duff, Adam Lamberg, Clayton Snyder
Outline: Lizzie McGuire has graduated from middle school and takes a trip to Rome, Italy with her class. And what was supposed to be only a normal trip, becomes a teenager's dream come true.

Name: Doctor Dolittle
Credit: Dir: Betty Thomas With: Eddie Murphy, Peter Boyle, Ossie Davis
Outline: A Doctor finds out that he can understand what animals are saying. And the animals find out that he understands.

Name: Hollywood Homicide
Credit: Dir: Ron Shelton With: Harrison Ford, Josh Hartnett, Isaiah Washington
Outline: Two LAPD detectives who moonlight in other fields investigate the murder of an up-and-coming rap group.

Name: Bachelorette
Credit: Dir: Leslye Headland With: Kirsten Dunst, Isla Fisher, Lizzy Caplan
Outline: Three friends are asked to be bridesmaids at a wedding of a woman they used to ridicule back in high school.

Name: One for the Money
Credit: Dir: Julie Anne Robinson With: Katherine Heigl, Jason O'Mara, Daniel Sunjata
Outline: Unemployed and newly-divorced Stephanie Plum lands a job at her cousin's bail-bond business, where her first assignment puts her on the trail of a wanted local cop from her romantic past.

Name: The Dilemma
Credit: Dir: Ron Howard With: Vince Vaughn, Kevin James, Winona Ryder
Outline: A man discovers that his best friend's wife is having an affair.

Name: The Tuxedo
Credit: Dir: Kevin Donovan With: Jackie Chan, Jennifer Love Hewitt, Jason Isaacs
Outline: A hapless chauffer must take a comatosed secret agent's place using his special gadget-laden tuxedo.

Name: The Back-up Plan
Credit: Dir: Alan Poul With: Jennifer Lopez, Alex O'Loughlin, Michaela Watkins
Outline: A romantic comedy centered on a woman who conceives twins through artificial insemination, only to meet the man of her dreams on the very same day.

Name: Little Nicky
Credit: Dir: Steven Brill With: Adam Sandler, Patricia Arquette, Harvey Keitel
Outline: After two of the devil's three sons escape Hell to wreak havoc on Earth, the devil must send his third son, the mild-mannered Nicky, to bring them back before it's too late.

Name: Aquamarine
Credit: Dir: Elizabeth Allen Rosenbaum With: Emma Roberts, Joanna 'JoJo' Levesque, Sara Paxton
Outline: Two teenage girls discover a mermaid in their beach club's swimming pool.

Name: Balls of Fury
Credit: Dir: Robert Ben Garant With: Dan Fogler, Christopher Walken, George Lopez
Outline: Down-and-out former professional ping-pong phenom, Randy Daytona, is sucked into a maelstrom when FBI Agent Ernie Rodriguez recruits him for a secret mission. Randy is determined to bounce back and win, and to smoke out his father's killer -- arch-fiend Feng.

Name: Alvin and the Chipmunks
Credit: Dir: Tim Hill With: Jason Lee, David Cross, Cameron Richardson
Outline: A struggling songwriter named Dave Seville finds success when he comes across a trio of singing chipmunks: mischievous leader Alvin, brainy Simon, and chubby, impressionable Theodore.

Name: License to Wed
Credit: Dir: Ken Kwapis With: Mandy Moore, John Krasinski, Robin Williams
Outline: A reverend puts an engaged couple through a grueling marriage preparation course to see if they are meant to be married in his church.

Name: Spy Hard
Credit: Dir: Rick Friedberg With: Leslie Nielsen, Nicollette Sheridan, Charles Durning
Outline: General Rancor is threatening to destroy the world with a missile he is hiding at his secret base. But to complete his goal...

Name: Scary Movie 2
Credit: Dir: Keenen Ivory Wayans With: Anna Faris, Marlon Wayans, Antony Acker
Outline: Four teens are tricked by their professor into visiting a haunted house for a school project.

Name: Coneheads
Credit: Dir: Steve Barron With: Dan Aykroyd, Jane Curtin, Robert Knott
Outline: Aliens with conical crania crash land on Earth.

Name: Paul Blart: Mall Cop
Credit: Dir: Steve Carr With: Kevin James, Keir O'Donnell, Jayma Mays
Outline: When a shopping mall is taken over by a gang of organized crooks, it's up to a mild-mannered security guard to save the day.

Name: Ri¢hie Ri¢h
Credit: Dir: Donald Petrie With: Macaulay Culkin, Edward Herrmann, John Larroquette
Outline: A rich young boy finds his family targeted in an inside job and must use his cunning to save them.

Name: The Stepford Wives
Credit: Dir: Frank Oz With: Nicole Kidman, Bette Midler, Matthew Broderick
Outline: What does it take to become a Stepford wife, a woman perfect beyond belief? Ask the Stepford husbands, who've created this high-tech terrifying little town, in a very modern comedy-thriller.

Name: The Wedding Planner
Credit: Dir: Adam Shankman With: Jennifer Lopez, Matthew McConaughey, Bridgette Wilson-Sampras
Outline: Mary Fiore is San Francisco's most successful supplier of romance and glamor. She knows all the tricks. She knows all the rules. But then she breaks the most important rule of all: she falls in love with the groom.

Name: Christmas with the Kranks
Credit: Dir: Joe Roth With: Tim Allen, Jamie Lee Curtis, Dan Aykroyd
Outline: With their daughter away, the Kranks decide to skip Christmas altogether until she decides to come home, causing an uproar when they have to celebrate the holiday at the last minute.

Name: Zookeeper
Credit: Dir: Frank Coraci With: Kevin James, Rosario Dawson, Leslie Bibb
Outline: A group of zoo animals decide to break their code of silence in order to help their lovable zoo keeper find love -- without opting to leave his current job for something more illustrious.

Name: Police Academy 3: Back in Training
Credit: Dir: Jerry Paris With: Steve Guttenberg, Bubba Smith, David Graf
Outline: The alumni of Commandant Lassard's Police Academy return to the school to train new recruits and prevent its closure.

Name: Cats & Dogs
Credit: Dir: Lawrence Guterman With: Alec Baldwin, Tobey Maguire, Jeff Goldblum
Outline: A look at the top-secret, high-tech espionage war going on between cats and dogs, which their human owners are blissfully unaware of.

Name: The Medallion
Credit: Dir: Gordon Chan With: Jackie Chan, Lee Evans, Claire Forlani
Outline: A Hong Kong detective suffers a fatal accident involving a mysterious medallion and is transformed into an immortal warrior with superhuman powers.

Name: Mr. Woodcock
Credit: Dir: Craig Gillespie With: Billy Bob Thornton, Seann William Scott, Susan Sarandon
Outline: Taken aback by his mother's wedding announcement, a young man returns home in an effort to stop her from marrying his old high school gym teacher, a man who made high school hell for generations of students.

Name: Flubber
Credit: Dir: Les Mayfield With: Robin Williams, Marcia Gay Harden, Christopher McDonald
Outline: An absent-minded professor discovers "flubber," a rubber-like super-bouncy substance.

Name: Jennifer's Body
Credit: Dir: Karyn Kusama With: Megan Fox, Amanda Seyfried, Adam Brody
Outline: A newly possessed high school cheerleader turns into a succubus who specializes in killing her male classmates. Can her best friend put an end to the horror?

Name: Sex Tape

Name: Meet the Spartans

Outline: The heroic Spartan king Leonidas, armed with nothing but leather underwear and a cape, leads a ragtag...

Name: Celal and Ceren
Credit: Dir: Togan GÃ¶kbakar With: Sahan GÃ¶kbakar, Ezgi Mola, Dilsah Demir
